title: Johan Theorin - The Asylum.epub
description: Dear Ivan, is it possible to write a love letter to someone you have never met? I've only seen your picture in the newspapers, below those terrible, screaming headlines. There is something about the look in your eyes, so calm and wise and yet so penetrating. I would like you to be able to look at me in reality too. I would love to meet you...An underground passage leads from the Dell nursery to Saint Patricia's asylum. Only the children enter, leaving their minders behind. On the other side are their parents - some of the most dangerous psychopaths in the country...Jan has just started working at the nursery. He is a loner with many secrets but only one goal. He must get inside the asylum...What is his connection with one of the inmates, a famous singer? What really happened when a boy in his care went missing nine years ago? Who can we trust when everyone has something to hide?
